prompt:
SCENE: Grand unification diagram - all concepts connected.
- Four nodes arranged in a diamond pattern:
  - TOP: Category Theory node (foundational, larger)
  - LEFT: Functors node
  - RIGHT: Monoids node  
  - BOTTOM: Monads node (culmination)
- Connecting lines between all nodes, glowing
- Center: A glowing core where all concepts meet
- Subtle code-like patterns flowing through the connections
- Overall feel: completion, mastery, power

STYLE:
- Constellation/network aesthetic
- Neon glows in multiple colors
- Dark background with subtle texture

EXPLICIT DIRECTIONS:
- Diamond layout with Category Theory at TOP
- Monad at BOTTOM (representing culmination)
- All connections visible
- Central convergence point clearly visible

CONSTRAINTS:
- No text
- No characters
- Family-friendly
- Original artwork only
